massim.competition2006

Class GridSimulationVisualizationObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • massim.framework.DefaultObserver
      • massim.competition2006.GridSimulationVisualizationObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Observer, ServerSimulationContextReceiver

    public class GridSimulationVisualizationObserver
extends DefaultObserver
implements ServerSimulationContextReceiver
    This VisualizationObserver takes care about the visualization (svg-files).
